class.name: NavigationPathQueryResult3D
class.brief_description: Result from a [NavigationServer3D] navigation path query.
class.description: This class contains result of a navigation path query from [method NavigationServer3D.query_path].

members.member: A series of waypoints to follow in order to reach the destination passed in [NavigationPathQueryParameters3D]. All points are in global coordinates.
Total length of the path in world units.
